title: a?
content:
hi all,

desperately in search of this font... with only an ’a’ in sight...

it remembers me of old-school ITC... not sure,

anyone?

gracias!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080924093205im_/http:/typophile.com/files/a_3910.gif)

author: matthijs van Leeuwen

comments.content: I think it was based on [Friz Quadrata Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20080924093205/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/itc/itc_friz_quadrata_bold/?sample_text=a&sample_size=288).
